product_name: GoPro HERO4 Silver Camera - Surf/SUP/Kayak Edition
long_description: The first GoPro featuring built-in touch display and on-the-fly highlighting, the Hero4 Silver Surf package let's you snag stunning POV footage directly from your surfboard, paddle board or kayak.
short_description: The first GoPro featuring built-in touch display and on-the-fly highlighting, the Hero4 Silver Surf package let's you snag stunning POV footage directly from your surfboard, paddle board or kayak.
